LanguageData.JCC_Welcome: This mod settings window will change both inventory capacity and carrying capacity settings for both existing and new saves by modifying the vanilla formulas.
LanguageData.JCC_AllowBodySizeMultiplierTooltip: By default, this is left as true.
LanguageData.JCC_BodySize: Body Size Multiplier: 1x (Adult human size) x
LanguageData.JCC_AllowBodySizeMultiplierICDesc: When checked, include the body size factor in the calculation for inventory capacity
LanguageData.JCC_InventoryCapacityMultiplierTooltip:
The amount of stuff a creature can carry in its inventory, also known as inventory mass or inventory capacity.

By default, this is 1x. Changing this will multiply the value by the number selected for all pawns capable of carrying inventories.

Example default pawn inventory mass: {0}.
New inventory mass: {3} (Base value: {0} x{1} Jecs Multiplier: {2})
LanguageData.JCC_AllowBodySizeMultiplierCCDesc: When checked, include the body size factor in the calculation for carrying capacity
LanguageData.JCC_CarryCapacityMultiplierTooltip:
The amount of stuff a creature can carry in its hands, mouth, or other manipulators.

By default, this is 1x. Changing this will multiply the value by the number selected for all pawns capable of carrying items.

Example default pawn carrying capacity: {0} items hauled at once.
New carrying capacity: {3} (Base value: {0} x{1} Jecs Multiplier: {2})

LanguageData.JCC_StatInfoBodySizeMultiplierDisabled: The multiplier for body size for carrying capacity has been disabled in Jec's Inventory and Carrying Capacity Settings mod.
